title: Doubleclicking on import statement transfers to referenced type
OB: In the package view outline, when double-clicking on a type import statement, the editor should open on the unit hosting the import reference, but instead it opens on the target type.
EB: When double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor opens on the target type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
SR: Modify the behavior so that double-clicking on a type import statement in the package view outline opens the editor on the unit hosting the import reference.
